title: Microsoft, OpenAI and Anthropic train teachers how to use AI
description: A group of leading tech companies is teaming up with two teachers’ unions to train 400,000 kindergarten through 12th grade teachers in artificial intelligence over the next five years.
content:
As schools and teachers scramble to figure out whether and how to implement AI in the classroom, three leading tech companies are investing in a new training program for educators. (skynesher/E+/Getty Images via CNN Newsource)

title: Nvidia closes at record $4-trillion market cap
description: The chipmaker has benefitted from rising demand for artificial-intelligence technology

title: UofT prof aims to build 50 companies
description: A Toronto university professor aims to make the city a global technology leader by launching 50 artificial intelligence (AI) companies to ensure Canada benefits economically from its own research while retaining talent at home.
content:
Daniel Wigdor, CEO and Co-Founder of AXL and a computer science professor at the University of Toronto, joins BNN Bloomberg to discuss fast-tracking AI commercialization in Canada.

title: Opinion: Why California’s attorney general must continue investigating OpenAI
description: The artificial intelligence giant's dizzying corporate structure and acquisitions raise privacy and safety concerns
content: Just days after abandoning its planned conversion to a for-profit entity and proclaiming it would remain a nonprofit, OpenAI puzzled us with another announcement: a nearly $6.5 billion deal to buy io, a start-up created by former Apple executive and ... [4240 chars]

title: Rock band with more than 1 million Spotify listeners reveals it's entirely AI-generated
description: The Velvet Sundown, a rock band that quickly shot to Spotify's top ranks, announced that it is actually wholly generated by artificial intelligence just one month after releasing its celebrated debut album.
content:
A fresh new rock band that quickly shot to Spotify’s top ranks announced that it’s actually wholly generated by artificial intelligence, just one month after its celebrated debut album earned it one million listeners.

title: Musk's xAI scrubs inappropriate posts after Grok chatbot makes antisemitic comments
description: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company said Wednesday that it's taking down “inappropriate posts" made by its Grok chatbot , which appeared to include antisemitic comments that praised Adolf Hitler.
